item.title: How I Made This Blog
item.description: Warning: You are about to read a blog post on how this blog was made - It's getting a little meta in here. Hugo: The world’s fastest framework for building websites. Credits This blog is made with Hugo. “The worldâ€™s fastest framework for building websites.”1 Basically, it’s just a static site generator built in go. When it comes time to compile, or build, the site it’s pretty fast.
